text: Sidney Brazier, GM (8 December 1919 – 12 May 2016) was a British Army bomb disposal officer who won a George Medal for defusing sticky bombs when he was a conductor in the Royal Army Ordnance Corps in 1963. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Bomb disposal personnel Category:British Army personnel of the Korean War Category:British military personnel of the Cyprus Emergency Category:British military personnel of the Troubles Category:People educated at Rotherham Grammar School Category:People from Rotherham Category:Royal Army Ordnance Corps officers Category:Recipients of the George Medal
title: Sidney Brazier
